scripts.doc: typedoc --out doc/ --module commonjs --target ES5 --name 'Cycle.js Most Adapter' src/index.ts
scripts.postdoc: git add doc/ && git commit -m 'chore(docs): build doc/'
scripts.postchangelog: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(changelog): generate changelog'
scripts.test: npm run lib && npm run lint && npm run unit-test
scripts.dist: rimraf dist/ && mkdirp dist && npm run lib && browserify lib/index.js -t babelify -t browserify-shim --standalone cycleMosAdapter --exclude most,most-subject --outfile dist/cycle-most-adapter.js && uglifyjs dist/cycle-most-adapter.js -o dist/cycle-most-adapter.min.js
scripts.postdist: git add dist/ && git commit -m 'chore(dist): build dist/'
scripts.lib: rimraf lib/ && mkdirp lib/ && typings install && tsc
scripts.prerelease: npm run doc && npm run dist
scripts.release-patch: npm run prerelease && npm version patch -m "chore(release): release new version" && npm run changelog
scripts.release-minor: npm run prerelease && npm version minor -m "chore(release): release new version" && npm run changelog
scripts.release-major: npm run prerelease && npm version major -m "chore(release): release new version" && npm run changelog
